include_guard()

project(ExternalMemoryManagerCWrapper)

add_library(ExternalMemoryManagerCWrapper STATIC "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/Source/ExternalMemoryManagerWrapper.cpp")
target_include_directories(ExternalMemoryManagerCWrapper PUBLIC "Include")
target_compile_options(ExternalMemoryManagerCWrapper PRIVATE "-Ofast")
target_compile_features(ExternalMemoryManagerCWrapper PRIVATE cxx_std_20)

target_link_libraries(ExternalMemoryManagerCWrapper PUBLIC ExternalMemoryManager MemoryManagerCWrapper)
